alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Clark; Madison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 3:57PM EDT until July 18 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR EASTERN CLARK...SOUTHEASTERN BOURBON...SOUTHEASTERN NICHOLAS AND EASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 357 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Carlisle to Mount Sterling to near Winston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harris Ferry, North Middletown, Goffs Corner, Duluth, Bighill, Panola, Mina, Moorefield, Plum and College Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
